price: Tendrán en él cuanto anhelen, y les tengo reservada una recompensa aun mayor".
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
